notes: RedNote verification unavailable due to headless browser issue. All data sourced from Gaode Maps POI search. For Hong Kong and Macau attractions, limited Gaode Maps data available - recommend using Google Maps for these locations.

attractions.name: 中央大街 / Zhongyang Street
attractions.location: Daoli District, Harbin / 哈尔滨市道里区
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening for illuminations, or daytime for architecture
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Famous pedestrian street with Russian-style architecture dating back to 1898. Features European baroque buildings, ice sculpture exhibitions in winter, and local food vendors. A symbol of Harbin's Russian cultural heritage.
attractions.location_base: Daoli District, Harbin / 哈尔滨市道里区
attractions.location_local: Daoli District, Harbin / 哈尔滨市道里区
attractions.notes_local: 免费步行。餐饮购物另付。冰雪节期间（12-2月）非常热闹。
attractions.notes_base: Free to walk. Dining and shopping cost extra. Very popular during ice festival season (Dec-Feb).

attractions.name: 圣·索菲亚教堂 / Saint Sophia Cathedral
attractions.location: Daoli District, Harbin / 哈尔滨市道里区透笼街88号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning or late afternoon for good lighting, evening for exterior illumination
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Built in 1907, this is the largest Orthodox church in the Far East. Now houses Harbin Architecture Art Museum. Byzantine-style green dome is iconic landmark. AAAA-rated scenic spot with 4.9/5 rating on Gaode Maps.
attractions.location_base: Daoli District, Harbin / 哈尔滨市道里区透笼街88号
attractions.location_local: Daoli District, Harbin / 哈尔滨市道里区透笼街88号
attractions.notes_local: 内部博物馆需购票。外观免费参观。非常上镜。
attractions.notes_base: Admission fee required for interior museum. Exterior viewing is free. Very photogenic.

attractions.name: 哈尔滨冰雪大世界 / Harbin Ice and Snow World
attractions.location: Sun Island, Harbin / 哈尔滨市太阳大道1458号
attractions.opening_hours: 10:00-21:30 (ticket sales stop at 20:30, entry stops at 21:00)
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Afternoon through evening (illuminated ice sculptures after dark are spectacular). Operating season: mid-December to late February.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: World's largest ice and snow art exhibition. Features massive ice sculptures, ice buildings, ice slides, and LED-lit ice palaces. Must-see winter attraction. 4.8/5 rating on Gaode Maps.
attractions.location_base: Sun Island, Harbin / 哈尔滨市太阳大道1458号
attractions.location_local: Sun Island, Harbin / 哈尔滨市太阳大道1458号
attractions.notes_local: 冬季限定景点。注意保暖。门票较贵但值得。夜晚冰雕灯光最佳。旺季建议提前预订。
attractions.notes_base: Seasonal attraction (winter only). Dress very warmly. Tickets are expensive but worth it. Best visited at night when ice sculptures are illuminated. Advance booking recommended during peak season.
attractions.type_base: Winter Theme Park / Ice Sculpture Park

attractions.name: 太阳岛风景区 / Sun Island Park
attractions.location: Sun Island, Harbin / 哈尔滨市太阳大道3号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning for fresh air, or afternoon. Summer for lush greenery, winter for snow sculptures.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: AAAAA national scenic area on Songhua River island. Features snow sculpture art expo in winter, beautiful gardens in summer, wetland parks, and riverside views. 4.8/5 rating on Gaode Maps. Large natural area perfect for walking and photography.
attractions.location_base: Sun Island, Harbin / 哈尔滨市太阳大道3号
attractions.location_local: Sun Island, Harbin / 哈尔滨市太阳大道3号
attractions.notes_local: 主景区需购票。部分小景点另收费。地铁2号线可达。
attractions.notes_base: Admission fee for main scenic area. Some sub-attractions have separate fees. Metro Line 2 accessible.

attractions.name: 东北虎林园 / Siberian Tiger Park
attractions.name_english: Siberian Tiger Park / Northeast Tiger Forest Park
attractions.location: Sun Island, Harbin / 哈尔滨市松北街88号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning when tigers are more active. Winter is good as tigers are adapted to cold weather.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: World's largest natural breeding base for endangered Siberian (Northeast) tigers. Home to over 1,000 tigers. Visitors ride in protected vehicles through tiger enclosures. Also features lions, leopards, and other big cats. AAAA-rated attraction with 4.8/5 rating.
attractions.name_base: Siberian Tiger Park / Northeast Tiger Forest Park
attractions.location_base: Sun Island, Harbin / 哈尔滨市松北街88号
attractions.location_local: Sun Island, Harbin / 哈尔滨市松北街88号
attractions.notes_local: 门票含穿越虎区的摆渡车。喂食活动另收费。有教育和保护意义。
attractions.notes_base: Admission includes shuttle bus through tiger areas. Optional feeding activities cost extra. Not recommended for very young children. Educational and conservation-focused.

attractions.name: 意式风情街 / Italian Style Street
attractions.name_chinese: 天津意大利风情旅游区
attractions.name_english: Tianjin Italian Style Street / Italian Concession Area
attractions.location: Hebei District, Tianjin / 天津市河北区进步道34号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Late afternoon through evening for cafes and dining
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Former Italian concession area (1902-1943) with well-preserved Italian architecture. Features over 200 European-style buildings, cafes, restaurants, and museums. Unique cultural area combining Italian and Chinese influences.
attractions.name_base: Tianjin Italian Style Street / Italian Concession Area
attractions.name_local: 天津意大利风情旅游区
attractions.location_base: Hebei District, Tianjin / 天津市河北区进步道34号
attractions.location_local: Hebei District, Tianjin / 天津市河北区进步道34号
attractions.notes_local: 免费参观。餐饮和博物馆另付费。非常适合拍照。靠近天津站。
attractions.notes_base: Free to walk around. Dining and museum entry costs extra. Very photogenic area. Close to Tianjin Railway Station.

attractions.name: 天津之眼 / Tianjin Eye
attractions.location: Hebei District, Tianjin / 天津市三岔河口永乐桥上
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening for city night views, clear weather days for best visibility
attractions.why_worth_visiting: World's only Ferris wheel built on a bridge. Height of 120m offers panoramic views of Tianjin cityscape and Hai River. AAAA scenic spot with 4.9/5 rating. Iconic Tianjin landmark.
attractions.location_base: Hebei District, Tianjin / 天津市三岔河口永乐桥上
attractions.location_local: Hebei District, Tianjin / 天津市三岔河口永乐桥上
attractions.notes_local: 票价为一圈（约30分钟）。热门景点可能排队。夜景最佳。
attractions.notes_base: Ticket price for one rotation (about 30 minutes). Popular attraction, may have queues. Best views at night.

attractions.name: 古文化街 / Ancient Culture Street
attractions.location: Nankai District, Tianjin / 天津市南开区古文化街
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Mid-morning through afternoon, or evening for atmosphere
attractions.why_worth_visiting: 600-meter long pedestrian street with traditional Chinese architecture from Qing Dynasty. Famous for Tianjin folk crafts, clay figurines (泥人张), New Year paintings, antiques, and local snacks. Cultural heritage area centered around Tianhou Temple.
attractions.location_base: Nankai District, Tianjin / 天津市南开区古文化街
attractions.location_local: Nankai District, Tianjin / 天津市南开区古文化街
attractions.notes_local: 街道免费进入。购物和美食另付。手工艺品可砍价。周末人多。
attractions.notes_base: Street access is free. Shopping and food cost extra. Bargaining is common for crafts. Can get crowded on weekends.

attractions.name: 五大道 / Five Great Avenues
attractions.name_chinese: 天津五大道文化旅游区
attractions.name_english: Tianjin Five Great Avenues Cultural Tourism Area
attractions.location: Heping District, Tianjin / 天津市和平区重庆道83号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning or late afternoon for walking tours, spring and autumn for pleasant weather
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Historic district with over 2,000 garden-style Western villas built in 1920s-30s. Features British, French, Italian, German, and Spanish architecture. Former residences of Chinese celebrities and foreign officials. National AAAAA scenic area. Best preserved example of colonial-era architecture in China.
attractions.name_base: Tianjin Five Great Avenues Cultural Tourism Area
attractions.name_local: 天津五大道文化旅游区
attractions.location_base: Heping District, Tianjin / 天津市和平区重庆道83号
attractions.location_local: Heping District, Tianjin / 天津市和平区重庆道83号
attractions.notes_local: 街道免费步行。部分洋楼开放为博物馆（另收费）。可租自行车或乘马车。适合建筑摄影。
attractions.notes_base: Free to walk the streets. Some villas are open as museums (separate fees). Rent a bicycle or take a horse carriage tour. Very good for architecture photography.

attractions.name: 秦始皇兵马俑博物馆 / Terracotta Warriors
attractions.name_english: Museum of Qin Terracotta Warriors and Horses
attractions.location: Lintong District, Xi'an / 西安市临潼区秦陵北路
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Early morning (8:30-9:30) to avoid crowds, or late afternoon (after 15:00)
attractions.why_worth_visiting: One of the greatest archaeological discoveries of the 20th century. Over 8,000 life-sized terracotta soldiers, horses, and chariots buried with Emperor Qin Shi Huang (210 BCE). UNESCO World Heritage Site. Called the 'Eighth Wonder of the World.' Three excavation pits open to visitors.
attractions.name_base: Museum of Qin Terracotta Warriors and Horses
attractions.location_base: Lintong District, Xi'an / 西安市临潼区秦陵北路
attractions.location_local: Lintong District, Xi'an / 西安市临潼区秦陵北路
attractions.notes_local: 强烈建议提前网上预约。建议请导游或使用语音导览。距市区40公里（1-1.5小时车程）。部分区域禁止拍照。
attractions.notes_base: Advance online booking strongly recommended. Hire a guide or use audio guide to understand history. Located 40km from downtown Xi'an (1-1.5 hour drive). Tourist buses available from Xi'an city center. No photography allowed in some areas.
attractions.type_base: Museum / Archaeological Site / UNESCO World Heritage

attractions.name: 华清宫 / Huaqing Palace
attractions.location: Lintong District, Xi'an / 西安市临潼区华清路38号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning or afternoon. Spring and autumn for comfortable weather. Evening for 'Song of Everlasting Sorrow' performance.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Tang Dynasty imperial palace and hot springs resort where Emperor Xuanzong and Consort Yang Guifei stayed. Features ancient bathing pools, classical gardens, and historical buildings. Site of 1936 Xi'an Incident. Located at foot of Mount Li. AAAAA scenic area.
attractions.location_base: Lintong District, Xi'an / 西安市临潼区华清路38号
attractions.location_local: Lintong District, Xi'an / 西安市临潼区华清路38号
attractions.notes_local: 可与兵马俑一起游览（均在临潼区）。可选晚间《长恨歌》演出（另付费，季节性）。温泉已不可泡浴。
attractions.notes_base: Can be combined with Terracotta Warriors visit (both in Lintong District). Optional evening performance 'Song of Everlasting Sorrow' (extra fee, seasonal). Hot springs no longer in use for bathing.
attractions.type_base: Imperial Palace / Hot Springs / Historic Site

attractions.name: 回民街 / Muslim Quarter
attractions.location: Lianhu District, Xi'an / 西安市莲湖区北院门
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening for atmosphere and food (18:00-21:00), avoid meal times if you want less crowds
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Historic Muslim community dating back to Tang Dynasty. Famous for Xi'an street food including lamb kebabs, roujiamo (Chinese hamburger), yangrou paomo (lamb soup), persimmon cakes, and various noodles. Vibrant night market atmosphere. Cultural heritage area with mosques.
attractions.location_base: Lianhu District, Xi'an / 西安市莲湖区北院门
attractions.location_local: Lianhu District, Xi'an / 西安市莲湖区北院门
attractions.notes_local: 免费进入。美食预算每人50-100元。晚间和周末非常拥挤。注意防盗。建议多品尝小吃。
attractions.notes_base: Entry is free. Budget 50-100 CNY per person for food tasting. Very crowded in evenings and weekends. Watch for pickpockets. Try multiple small dishes rather than large meals.

attractions.name: 钟鼓楼 / Bell and Drum Towers
attractions.name_english: Xi'an Bell Tower and Drum Tower Museum
attractions.location: Beilin District, Xi'an / 西安市莲湖区西大街北院门
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening for night views and illumination (Bell Tower especially photogenic), or during drum performance times
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Bell Tower (built 1384 Ming Dynasty) is the largest and best-preserved ancient bell tower in China. Drum Tower houses ancient drums and hosts traditional performances. Both are iconic Xi'an landmarks located at city center. Offer panoramic city views from top.
attractions.name_base: Xi'an Bell Tower and Drum Tower Museum
attractions.location_base: Beilin District, Xi'an / 西安市莲湖区西大街北院门
attractions.location_local: Beilin District, Xi'an / 西安市莲湖区西大街北院门
attractions.notes_local: 联票比单买便宜。夜景灯光壮观。鼓楼有定时表演。位于市中心靠近回民街。
attractions.notes_base: Combo ticket for both towers is cheaper than separate. Evening illumination is spectacular. Drum performances at scheduled times. Located at heart of city near Muslim Quarter. Can be visited before dinner at Muslim Quarter.

attractions.name: 西安城墙 / Xi'an City Wall
attractions.location: Multiple gates, Xi'an / 西安市南大街2号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Late afternoon into evening (sunset views), or early morning for cycling. Spring and autumn for comfortable weather.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Best-preserved ancient city wall in China. Originally built in Tang Dynasty, current structure from Ming Dynasty (14th century). Total length 13.7 km, width 12-14m at top. Can walk or cycle on top of wall for panoramic city views. Multiple gates to access (South Gate/Yongning Gate is most impressive).
attractions.location_base: Multiple gates, Xi'an / 西安市南大街2号
attractions.location_local: Multiple gates, Xi'an / 西安市南大街2号
attractions.notes_local: 城墙上可租自行车（另付约45元，100分钟）。多个城门可进入。南门（永宁门）设施最好。骑行全程3-4小时，步行5-6小时。
attractions.notes_base: Bike rental available on wall (separate fee ~45 CNY, 100 minutes). Multiple entrance gates. South Gate (Yongning) has best access and facilities. Takes 3-4 hours to cycle full circuit, 5-6 hours to walk. Evening illumination is beautiful.

attractions.name: 大雁塔 / Giant Wild Goose Pagoda
attractions.name_english: Giant Wild Goose Pagoda / Big Wild Goose Pagoda
attractions.location: Yanta District, Xi'an / 西安市雁塔区慈恩路1号大慈恩寺内
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning or late afternoon. North Square fountain show in evening (20:30, free).
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Built in 652 CE (Tang Dynasty) to house Buddhist scriptures brought from India by monk Xuanzang. Seven-story brick pagoda standing 64m tall. Symbol of Xi'an and UNESCO World Heritage Site. Located within Dacien Temple. North Square has Asia's largest musical fountain.
attractions.name_base: Giant Wild Goose Pagoda / Big Wild Goose Pagoda
attractions.location_base: Yanta District, Xi'an / 西安市雁塔区慈恩路1号大慈恩寺内
attractions.location_local: Yanta District, Xi'an / 西安市雁塔区慈恩路1号大慈恩寺内
attractions.notes_local: 门票含寺院和塔。可登塔俯瞰城市。北广场音乐喷泉免费且热门（通常晚间，查时间表）。
attractions.notes_base: Admission to temple grounds and pagoda. Can climb to top for city views. North Square fountain show is free and very popular (check schedule, typically evenings). South Square also has gardens and cultural facilities.
attractions.type_base: Buddhist Pagoda / Temple / UNESCO World Heritage

attractions.name: 陕西历史博物馆 / Shaanxi History Museum
attractions.location: Yanta District, Xi'an / 西安市雁塔区小寨东路91号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Weekday mornings to avoid crowds. Advance online reservation required (free tickets).
attractions.why_worth_visiting: One of China's first large-scale national museums and most important. Houses over 370,000 cultural relics from prehistoric times to Qing Dynasty, spanning over 1 million years. Highlights include Tang Dynasty artifacts, ancient bronze ware, pottery, and wall murals. Essential for understanding Xi'an and Shaanxi history.
attractions.location_base: Yanta District, Xi'an / 西安市雁塔区小寨东路91号
attractions.location_local: Yanta District, Xi'an / 西安市雁塔区小寨东路91号
attractions.notes_local: 免费但须提前网上预约（常提前数天约满）。特展可能收费。至少预留2-3小时。建议语音导览。
attractions.notes_base: FREE admission but must reserve tickets online in advance (often books up days ahead). Special exhibitions may require paid tickets. Allow 2-3 hours minimum. English explanations available. Audio guide or human guide recommended. Photography restrictions in some areas.

attractions.name: 大唐不夜城 / Tang Dynasty Ever-Bright City
attractions.name_english: Tang Dynasty Never-Night City / Datang Everbright City
attractions.location: Yanta District, Xi'an / 西安市雁塔区雁塔南路428号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening from 19:00 onwards for full illumination and performances
attractions.why_worth_visiting: 1.5km long pedestrian street recreating Tang Dynasty atmosphere with modern technology. Features elaborate architecture, sculptures of Tang emperors and poets, street performances, holographic shows, and the famous 'Miss Tumbler' (不倒翁) performance. Connects Big Wild Goose Pagoda to the north with Shaanxi Grand Opera House to the south. Free admission.
attractions.name_base: Tang Dynasty Never-Night City / Datang Everbright City
attractions.location_base: Yanta District, Xi'an / 西安市雁塔区雁塔南路428号
attractions.location_local: Yanta District, Xi'an / 西安市雁塔区雁塔南路428号
attractions.notes_local: 完全免费。夜晚灯光最佳。周末非常拥挤。演出时间不固定。餐厅和商店众多。建议1.5-2小时。
attractions.notes_base: Completely free. Best at night with illuminations. Very popular and crowded on weekends. Performance schedules vary. Many restaurants and shops. Can get very crowded during holidays. Allocate 1.5-2 hours for walking and performances.

attractions.name: 拙政园 / Humble Administrator's Garden
attractions.location: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区东北街178号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Early morning (7:30-9:00) for fewer crowds, spring for flowers, autumn for colors
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Largest and most famous classical garden in Suzhou. Built in 1509 during Ming Dynasty. UNESCO World Heritage Site. Masterpiece of Chinese landscape garden design with ponds, pavilions, rockeries, and lush vegetation. Considered one of four great gardens of China.
attractions.location_base: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区东北街178号
attractions.location_local: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区东北街178号
attractions.notes_local: 建议提前预约。中午人多。可与苏州博物馆一起游览。摄影爱好者需多留时间。
attractions.notes_base: Advance booking recommended. Can get crowded midday. Combine with nearby Suzhou Museum visit. Photography enthusiasts should allow extra time. Best appreciated slowly with attention to garden details.
attractions.type_base: Classical Chinese Garden / UNESCO World Heritage

attractions.name: 苏州博物馆 / Suzhou Museum
attractions.location: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区东北街204号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Weekday mornings. Must reserve tickets online in advance (free).
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Designed by renowned architect I.M. Pei (贝聿铭), blending traditional Suzhou style with modern architecture. Houses important collection of ancient Chinese art, calligraphy, and Suzhou cultural relics. The building itself is an attraction. Adjacent to Humble Administrator's Garden.
attractions.location_base: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区东北街204号
attractions.location_local: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区东北街204号
attractions.notes_local: 免费但需提前网上预约。非常热门，提前3-5天预约。建筑本身就是看点。大部分区域可拍照。
attractions.notes_base: FREE admission with advance online reservation. Very popular, book 3-5 days ahead. Museum architecture is as impressive as the collections. Photography allowed in most areas. Suzhou Museum West Hall is a separate location.

attractions.name: 平江路古街 / Pingjiang Road Historic Street
attractions.location: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区平江路
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Late afternoon through evening for ambiance, or early morning for quieter experience
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Best-preserved historic canal street in Suzhou, dating back 2,500 years. Features traditional white-walled, black-tiled architecture along waterways. Small bridges, flowing water, and ancient houses. Mix of traditional culture with modern cafes, teahouses, and craft shops. Free to walk.
attractions.location_base: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区平江路
attractions.location_local: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区平江路
attractions.notes_local: 免费进入。餐饮购物乘船另付。可坐小船游河（另付费）。下午和傍晚人多。处处可拍照。
attractions.notes_base: Free access. Spending money for food/shops/boats. Can take small boat rides on canal (extra fee). Gets crowded in afternoon/evening. Photography opportunities everywhere. Connects to other historic areas.

attractions.name: 山塘街 / Shantang Street
attractions.location: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区山塘街
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening for illuminations and dinner (18:00-21:00)
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Historic 7-km canal street built in Tang Dynasty (825 CE) by poet Bai Juyi. Known as 'First Street of Suzhou.' Features traditional architecture, canal views, local restaurants, and teahouses. Beautiful red lantern illuminations at night. More lively than Pingjiang Road.
attractions.location_base: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区山塘街
attractions.location_local: Gusu District, Suzhou / 苏州市姑苏区山塘街
attractions.notes_local: 主街免费步行。部分历史建筑收门票。适合晚餐——品尝苏式面食。夜景是亮点。
attractions.notes_base: Free to walk main street. Some historical buildings charge admission. Popular for dinner - try Suzhou-style noodles and snacks. Evening boat rides available. Night scene is the highlight.

attractions.name: 西湖 / West Lake
attractions.location: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区龙井路1号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Early morning for peaceful atmosphere, late afternoon for sunset, any season is beautiful
attractions.why_worth_visiting: UNESCO World Heritage Site and China's most famous lake. Iconic natural beauty with surrounding mountains, historic temples, gardens, and pagodas. Famous for Ten Scenes of West Lake including Su Causeway in Spring, Broken Bridge with Melting Snow. Free admission to entire scenic area. Boat cruises available.
attractions.location_base: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区龙井路1号
attractions.location_local: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区龙井路1号
attractions.notes_local: 主湖区免费。游船另付（游岛55元）。部分景点（寺庙、园林）另收门票。可步行或租车环湖。春秋为旺季。
attractions.notes_base: Main lake is FREE. Boat cruises have fees (55 CNY for cruise to islands). Some surrounding attractions (temples, gardens) have separate admission. Can walk or rent bike around lake. Famous Su Causeway and Bai Causeway for walking. Spring and autumn are peak seasons.
attractions.type_base: Lake / Scenic Area / UNESCO World Heritage

attractions.name: 灵隐寺 / Lingyin Temple
attractions.name_english: Lingyin Temple / Temple of Soul's Retreat
attractions.location: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区法云弄1号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Early morning (7:00-9:00) for morning prayers and fewer crowds, avoid weekends and holidays
attractions.why_worth_visiting: One of China's largest and most prestigious Buddhist temples, founded in 326 CE (Eastern Jin Dynasty). Features magnificent halls, ancient Buddhist statues, and rock carvings. Includes Feilai Feng (Flying Peak) with 470+ stone carvings from 10th-14th centuries. Set in forested mountains. Active monastery with chanting monks.
attractions.name_base: Lingyin Temple / Temple of Soul's Retreat
attractions.location_base: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区法云弄1号
attractions.location_local: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区法云弄1号
attractions.notes_local: 景区门票45元+寺庙门票30元=共75元。非常热门。可烧香。有素斋餐厅。位于西湖以西约30分钟车程。
attractions.notes_base: Entrance to scenic area (45 CNY) + temple ticket (30 CNY) = 75 CNY total. Very popular, expect crowds. Incense burning allowed. Vegetarian restaurant on site. Located west of West Lake, about 30 min from city center.

attractions.name: 龙井村 / Longjing Tea Village
attractions.name_english: Longjing Village / Dragon Well Tea Village
attractions.location: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区龙井村
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Spring (March-April) for tea harvest season, or autumn. Morning for tea tasting.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Famous village producing Longjing (Dragon Well) tea, one of China's most renowned green teas. Scenic tea terraces on hillsides. Opportunity to visit tea farms, watch tea processing, taste fresh tea, and buy authentic Longjing tea. Beautiful rural scenery and traditional village atmosphere.
attractions.name_base: Longjing Village / Dragon Well Tea Village
attractions.location_base: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区龙井村
attractions.location_local: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区龙井村
attractions.notes_local: 村庄免费进入。品茶和购买另付。正宗龙井茶较贵。小心旅游陷阱和假茶。建议去正规茶馆。
attractions.notes_base: Village access is free. Tea tasting and purchases cost money. Authentic Longjing tea is expensive (genuine tea 200-2000+ CNY per jin/500g depending on grade). Beware of tourist traps and fake tea. Best to visit reputable tea houses. Can hike to tea plantations. Located between West Lake and Jiuxi area.

attractions.name: 西溪湿地 / Xixi Wetland
attractions.location: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区天目山路
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Spring and autumn for comfortable weather and bird watching, early morning for wildlife
attractions.why_worth_visiting: China's first national wetland park and rare urban wetland ecosystem. Features waterways, marshes, traditional fishing villages, and rich biodiversity. Peaceful natural environment within city. Boat tours through wetland channels. Featured in movie 'If You Are the One.'
attractions.location_base: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区天目山路
attractions.location_local: Xihu District, Hangzhou / 杭州市西湖区天目山路
attractions.notes_local: 门票80元。电动船另付（60-100元）。公园很大建议坐船。比西湖人少。至少预留2-3小时。
attractions.notes_base: Entrance fee 80 CNY. Electric boat tours additional fee (60-100 CNY). Large park - electric boats recommended to cover main areas. Spring for flowers, autumn for foliage. Less crowded than West Lake. Plan 2-3 hours minimum.

attractions.name: 漓江游船 / Li River Cruise
attractions.location: From Guilin to Yangshuo / 桂林市-阳朔县
attractions.address: 磨盘山码头 (Mopanshan Pier, Guilin) to 阳朔 (Yangshuo)
attractions.opening_hours: Cruises typically depart 09:00-10:00, journey is 4-5 hours
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Spring (April-May) and Autumn (Sept-Oct) for best weather. Morning departure to arrive Yangshuo in afternoon.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: One of China's most scenic river cruises through karst mountain landscape. 83km cruise from Guilin to Yangshuo shows stunning limestone peaks, rural villages, bamboo groves, and water buffalo. Inspiration for Chinese landscape paintings and featured on 20 CNY banknote. Essential Guilin experience.
attractions.location_base: From Guilin to Yangshuo / 桂林市-阳朔县
attractions.location_local: From Guilin to Yangshuo / 桂林市-阳朔县
attractions.notes_local: 提前订票。价格因船型而异。通常含午餐。航程4-5小时。建议上午出发。天气好时最佳。
attractions.notes_base: Book cruise tickets in advance. Price varies by boat type (standard to luxury). Lunch usually included. Journey takes 4-5 hours. Morning departure recommended. Arrive Yangshuo by boat, stay in Yangshuo. Return to Guilin by bus if needed. Weather dependent - best on clear days.

attractions.name: 西街 / West Street (Yangshuo)
attractions.location: Yangshuo County, Guilin / 阳朔县西街
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening (18:00-22:00) for atmosphere, dining, and entertainment
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Yangshuo's main tourist street, over 1,400 years old. Unique blend of Chinese and Western culture with international restaurants, bars, cafes, and shops. Lively nightlife. Center of Yangshuo backpacker and tourist scene. Mix of traditional architecture and modern amenities.
attractions.location_base: Yangshuo County, Guilin / 阳朔县西街
attractions.location_local: Yangshuo County, Guilin / 阳朔县西街
attractions.notes_local: 免费步行。餐饮购物另付。旅游气息浓但氛围好。适合漓江下船后晚餐。酒吧街夜间较吵。
attractions.notes_base: Free to walk. Spending for food/drinks/shopping. Very touristy but fun atmosphere. Good for dinner after arriving from Li River cruise. Many international cuisine options. Bar street gets loud at night. Shopping for souvenirs and local crafts.

attractions.name: 印象刘三姐 / Impression Liu Sanjie
attractions.name_english: Impression Liu Sanjie / Impression Sanjie Liu
attractions.location: Yangshuo County, Guilin / 阳朔县田园路
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening show. Book in advance during peak season. Weather dependent (outdoor show).
attractions.why_worth_visiting: World's largest natural theater directed by Zhang Yimou (Olympics opening ceremony director). Spectacular outdoor light show using Li River and karst mountains as backdrop. Over 600 performers depicting ethnic minority folk songs and legends. Unique combination of nature, culture, and technology.
attractions.name_base: Impression Liu Sanjie / Impression Sanjie Liu
attractions.location_base: Yangshuo County, Guilin / 阳朔县田园路
attractions.location_local: Yangshuo County, Guilin / 阳朔县田园路
attractions.notes_local: 票价238-680元视座位而定。旺季提前订票。雨天可能取消（露天演出）。冬天注意保暖。距阳朔镇10分钟。
attractions.notes_base: Tickets 238-680 CNY depending on seating. Book in advance, especially peak season. Shows weather-dependent (cancelled in heavy rain). Dress warmly in winter. Located 10 min from Yangshuo town. Shuttle buses available. Performance is in Chinese but visual spectacle transcends language.

attractions.name: 遇龙河竹筏漂流 / Yulong River Bamboo Rafting
attractions.location: Yangshuo County / 阳朔县遇龙河
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning (8:00-10:00) for fewer crowds and good light, spring and autumn for weather
attractions.why_worth_visiting: More peaceful and authentic than Li River. Bamboo rafting on traditional rafts through pristine karst landscape. Crystal-clear water, ancient bridges, rice paddies, and rural villages. Called 'Little Li River.' Multiple rafting sections available. One of Yangshuo's best activities.
attractions.location_base: Yangshuo County / 阳朔县遇龙河
attractions.location_local: Yangshuo County / 阳朔县遇龙河
attractions.notes_local: 价格因漂流段而异（80-240元）。最热门：金龙桥到旧县。两人一筏。带防水袋。可能会湿。可与十里画廊骑行结合。
attractions.notes_base: Price varies by rafting section (80-240 CNY). Most popular: Jinlong Bridge to Jiuxian ancient town. 2-person raft (can share with stranger if solo). Bring waterproof bag for belongings. Can get wet. Photos by raft operators cost extra. Combine with cycling Ten-Mile Gallery.

attractions.name: 十里画廊 / Ten-Mile Gallery
attractions.location: Yangshuo County / 阳朔县十里画廊
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning or late afternoon for best light and temperatures, spring for flowers, autumn for harvest scenery
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Scenic 10-km countryside road through karst mountains, rice fields, and rural villages. Best experienced by bicycle. Connects multiple small attractions (Moon Hill, Big Banyan Tree, Butterfly Cave). Authentic rural Guangxi scenery. Very popular cycling route.
attractions.location_base: Yangshuo County / 阳朔县十里画廊
attractions.location_local: Yangshuo County / 阳朔县十里画廊
attractions.notes_local: 道路免费通行。沿途部分景点收费（月亮山15元等）。在阳朔镇租电动车或自行车（20-40元/天）。平坦好骑。带水和防晒。
attractions.notes_base: Road access is free. Some attractions along route charge admission (Moon Hill 15 CNY, etc). Rent electric bike or bicycle in Yangshuo town (20-40 CNY/day). Easy flat cycling. Can combine with Yulong River rafting. Allow 2-3 hours for cycling and stops. Bring water and sun protection.

attractions.name: 银子岩 / Silver Cave
attractions.location: Yangshuo/Lipu County / 荔浦县马岭镇
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Any time (indoor attraction), morning or afternoon
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Spectacular limestone cave with stalactites, stalagmites, and rock formations. Well-lit and developed for tourism. Features three main sections representing classic karst cave scenery. Cooler temperature inside (good for hot days). Located between Guilin and Yangshuo.
attractions.location_base: Yangshuo/Lipu County / 荔浦县马岭镇
attractions.location_local: Yangshuo/Lipu County / 荔浦县马岭镇
attractions.notes_local: 门票65元。距阳朔约30公里（45分钟车程）。洞内步行道约2公里。台阶湿滑穿好鞋。洞内较潮湿。
attractions.notes_base: Admission 65 CNY. About 30km from Yangshuo (45 min drive). Can combine with return trip to Guilin. Walking path through cave is about 2km. Slippery stairs and uneven ground - wear good shoes. Can be humid inside. Popular with Chinese tour groups.

attractions.name: 月亮山 / Moon Hill
attractions.location: Yangshuo County / 阳朔县高田镇
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Early morning or late afternoon for cooler temperatures and good light, clear weather days
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Iconic karst mountain with natural arch (moon-shaped hole) at summit. 30-minute hike up 800+ steps to spectacular panoramic views of Yangshuo countryside. The 'moon' shape changes as you move around the mountain. Famous rock climbing destination. On Ten-Mile Gallery route.
attractions.location_base: Yangshuo County / 阳朔县高田镇
attractions.location_local: Yangshuo County / 阳朔县高田镇
attractions.notes_local: 门票15元。爬800+级台阶需一定体力。带水。山顶风景值得。可从山脚免费远观。十里画廊骑行路线的一部分。
attractions.notes_base: Admission 15 CNY. Steep climb with many stairs - moderate fitness required. Bring water. Views from top are worth the effort. Can view from base for free. Rock climbing available for experienced climbers (extra fee). Part of Ten-Mile Gallery cycling route.

attractions.name: 张家界国家森林公园 / Zhangjiajie National Forest Park
attractions.location: Zhangjiajie City, Hunan / 湖南省张家界市武陵源区
attractions.address: 武陵源区张家界国家森林公园
attractions.best_time_to_visit: April-May and September-October for best weather. Early morning for fewer crowds and misty views.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: China's first national forest park and UNESCO World Heritage Site. Famous for thousands of sandstone pillars (inspiration for Avatar's Hallelujah Mountains). Spectacular karst landscapes, deep ravines, lush forests, and unique geology. Contains Yuanjiajie, Tianzi Mountain, Golden Whip Stream, and more.
attractions.location_base: Zhangjiajie City, Hunan / 湖南省张家界市武陵源区
attractions.location_local: Zhangjiajie City, Hunan / 湖南省张家界市武陵源区
attractions.notes_local: 多日票（228元有效4天）。公园很大一天较赶，2-3天最佳。缆车电梯另付（67-72元）。穿舒适登山鞋。天气多变。观景台和缆车处人多。
attractions.notes_base: Multi-day ticket (228 CNY valid 4 days). Vast park - one day is rushed, 2-3 days ideal. Cable cars and elevators cost extra (67-72 CNY each). Wear comfortable hiking shoes. Weather can change quickly. Stay in park or nearby Wulingyuan town. Extremely popular - expect crowds especially at viewpoints and cable cars.
attractions.type_base: National Park / UNESCO World Heritage / Scenic Area

attractions.name: 袁家界 / Yuanjiajie (Avatar Hallelujah Mountain)
attractions.location: Within Zhangjiajie National Forest Park / 张家界国家森林公园袁家界景区
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Early morning for misty atmospheric views, clear days for distant vistas
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Home to the famous Avatar Hallelujah Mountain (Southern Sky Column) - the inspiration for floating mountains in Avatar movie. Spectacular viewing platforms overlooking thousands of sandstone pillars. Natural stone bridge, Glass Bridge viewing deck. Most iconic photography location in Zhangjiajie.
attractions.location_base: Within Zhangjiajie National Forest Park / 张家界国家森林公园袁家界景区
attractions.location_local: Within Zhangjiajie National Forest Park / 张家界国家森林公园袁家界景区
attractions.notes_local: 含在公园门票内。可乘百龙天梯（72元，世界最高户外电梯326米）或徒步。旺季电梯排队2小时+。步行环线2-3小时。必游区域。
attractions.notes_base: Included in park entrance ticket. Access via Bailong Elevator (72 CNY, tallest outdoor elevator in world, 326m) or hiking. Elevator can have 2+ hour queues in peak season. Walking loop takes 2-3 hours. Must-see area of the park. Very crowded at Avatar Mountain viewpoint.

attractions.name: 天子山 / Tianzi Mountain
attractions.location: Within Zhangjiajie National Forest Park / 张家界国家森林公园天子山景区
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning for sunrise and sea of clouds, clear weather for visibility
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Highest peak area in Zhangjiajie with expansive panoramic views. Features several famous viewpoints: Helong Park, Imperial Brush Peaks, Fairy Offering Flowers. Cable car provides easiest access and scenic ride. On clear days, see for miles across the pillar landscape.
attractions.location_base: Within Zhangjiajie National Forest Park / 张家界国家森林公园天子山景区
attractions.location_local: Within Zhangjiajie National Forest Park / 张家界国家森林公园天子山景区
attractions.notes_local: 含在公园门票内。缆车67元单程（建议上山乘坐）。可徒步上下（较累）。多个观景点沿山脊步道。天气影响能见度。预留2-3小时。
attractions.notes_base: Included in park ticket. Cable car 67 CNY one-way (recommended uphill). Can hike up/down (strenuous). Multiple scenic viewpoints along ridge walk. Connects to Yuanjiajie area. Weather dependent for views - can be fogged in. Allow 2-3 hours for cable car and walking viewpoints.

attractions.name: 金鞭溪 / Golden Whip Stream
attractions.location: Within Zhangjiajie National Forest Park / 张家界国家森林公园金鞭溪景区
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning for cooler temperatures, after rain for flowing water
attractions.why_worth_visiting: 7.5km scenic valley walk along crystal-clear stream at base of towering sandstone pillars. Relatively flat and easy trail. Lush vegetation, clear water, and towering formations on both sides. Popular with photographers. Named for 380m Golden Whip Rock formation. Peaceful alternative to crowded mountaintop areas.
attractions.location_base: Within Zhangjiajie National Forest Park / 张家界国家森林公园金鞭溪景区
attractions.location_local: Within Zhangjiajie National Forest Park / 张家界国家森林公园金鞭溪景区
attractions.notes_local: 含在公园门票内。全程较平坦。全程步行2.5-3小时。可中途转缆车上山。带水和零食。可能遇到猴子（勿喂食）。适合上午游览。
attractions.notes_base: Included in park ticket. Easiest hiking in park (mostly flat). Takes 2.5-3 hours to walk full length. Can exit midway via side trails to cable cars. Bring water and snacks. Monkeys may be present (don't feed or provoke). Good for morning visit before ascending to mountains.

attractions.name: 广州塔 / Canton Tower
attractions.location: Haizhu District, Guangzhou / 广州市海珠区阅江西路222号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening for sunset and night city views, clear weather days
attractions.why_worth_visiting: 600m tall TV tower, tallest structure in China and 2nd tallest tower in world. Iconic Guangzhou landmark with observation decks offering 360° city views. Features Sky Drop (free fall ride), Ferris wheel, and bubble tram. Stunning LED light shows at night. Symbol of modern Guangzhou.
attractions.location_base: Haizhu District, Guangzhou / 广州市海珠区阅江西路222号
attractions.location_local: Haizhu District, Guangzhou / 广州市海珠区阅江西路222号
attractions.notes_local: 票价因楼层而异：150元（低层观景台）至398元（顶层+项目）。网上购票有优惠。晚间票热门。地铁可达。预留1.5-2小时。带身份证取票。
attractions.notes_base: Tickets vary by level: 150 CNY (lower observation deck) to 398 CNY (top deck + attractions). Book online for discounts. Evening tickets popular. Metro accessible (Canton Tower station). Allow 1.5-2 hours. Brings ID for ticket pickup.

attractions.name: 沙面岛 / Shamian Island
attractions.location: Liwan District, Guangzhou / 广州市荔湾区沙面街道
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning or late afternoon for walking, evening for cafes and dining
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Small sandbank island with well-preserved European colonial architecture. Former British and French concession (1859-1949). Tree-lined streets, Victorian and Neo-classical buildings, churches, and statues. Peaceful atmosphere with cafes, art galleries, and photo opportunities. Feels like European town in China.
attractions.location_base: Liwan District, Guangzhou / 广州市荔湾区沙面街道
attractions.location_local: Liwan District, Guangzhou / 广州市荔湾区沙面街道
attractions.notes_local: 免费参观。咖啡馆餐厅另付。非常适合拍照。适合悠闲散步。部分建筑为领事馆。热门婚纱摄影地。靠近黄沙地铁站。
attractions.notes_base: Free to visit. Spending for cafes/restaurants. Very photogenic. Good for leisurely walk. Some buildings house consulates. Popular wedding photo location. Can walk entire island in 1-2 hours. Near Huangsha Metro station.

attractions.name: 陈家祠 / Chen Clan Ancestral Hall
attractions.name_english: Chen Clan Ancestral Hall / Chen Clan Academy
attractions.location: Liwan District, Guangzhou / 广州市荔湾区中山七路恩龙里34号
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning or afternoon, weekdays for fewer crowds
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Finest example of Lingnan (Cantonese) ancestral architecture. Built 1890-1894 by 72 Chen clan families. Features exquisite wood carvings, stone carvings, brick carvings, pottery sculptures, and paintings. Now houses Guangdong Folk Art Museum. Excellent craftsmanship and traditional Cantonese culture.
attractions.name_base: Chen Clan Ancestral Hall / Chen Clan Academy
attractions.location_base: Liwan District, Guangzhou / 广州市荔湾区中山七路恩龙里34号
attractions.location_local: Liwan District, Guangzhou / 广州市荔湾区中山七路恩龙里34号
attractions.notes_local: 门票10元。可拍照。多个庭院和大厅保存完好。有语音导览。预留1-1.5小时。可购买传统工艺品纪念品。地铁陈家祠站。
attractions.notes_base: Admission 10 CNY. Photography allowed. Well-preserved complex with multiple courtyards and halls. Audio guides available. Allow 1-1.5 hours. Good souvenir shopping for traditional crafts. Metro accessible (Chen Clan Academy station). Less crowded than major attractions.

attractions.name: 深圳华侨城 / OCT Loft
attractions.location: Nanshan District, Shenzhen / 深圳市南山区华侨城创意文化园
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Afternoon through evening for galleries, cafes, and atmosphere
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Trendy arts and culture district in converted industrial buildings. Features contemporary art galleries, design studios, bookshops, cafes, and restaurants. Shenzhen's answer to Beijing 798 Art District. Creative hub with exhibitions, events, and performances. Instagram-worthy industrial-chic aesthetic.
attractions.location_base: Nanshan District, Shenzhen / 深圳市南山区华侨城创意文化园
attractions.location_local: Nanshan District, Shenzhen / 深圳市南山区华侨城创意文化园
attractions.notes_local: 园区免费进入。个别场馆可能收费。周末有活动和市集。地铁可达。适合喝咖啡、逛展、拍照。
attractions.notes_base: Free to enter area. Individual venues may charge. Popular with artists and creatives. Good for coffee, browsing, and photo opportunities. Weekend events and markets. Metro accessible. Modern Shenzhen culture.

attractions.name: 太平山 / Victoria Peak
attractions.location: Central & Western District, Hong Kong / 香港中西区山顶道
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Clear weather days essential. Sunset for best views, or night for city lights. Avoid weekends and holidays.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Hong Kong's premier viewpoint at 552m elevation. Offers spectacular panoramic views of Hong Kong skyline, Victoria Harbour, and surrounding islands. Peak Tram is historic funicular railway (since 1888). Sky Terrace 428 observation deck. Essential Hong Kong experience.
attractions.location_base: Central & Western District, Hong Kong / 香港中西区山顶道
attractions.location_local: Central & Western District, Hong Kong / 香港中西区山顶道
attractions.notes_local: 山顶缆车往返+凌霄阁约115港币。缆车高峰排队1-2小时。替代方案：巴士15路或出租车上山。天气好很关键。傍晚人多。
attractions.notes_base: Peak Tram round-trip + Sky Terrace ~HK$115 (62 CNY). Long queues for tram (1-2 hours peak times). Alternative: take bus 15 or taxi up, tram down. Clear weather crucial - check forecast. Evening rush can be very crowded. Restaurants and shops at Peak Galleria and Peak Tower.

attractions.name: 尖沙咀 / Tsim Sha Tsui
attractions.location: Kowloon, Hong Kong / 香港九龙尖沙咀
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening for Symphony of Lights show (20:00), waterfront promenade at dusk
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Kowloon's premier tourist and shopping district. Features Victoria Harbour waterfront promenade with iconic views of Hong Kong Island skyline. Avenue of Stars (Hong Kong's Walk of Fame). Symphony of Lights show nightly. Museums, shopping malls, restaurants. Cultural heart of Kowloon.
attractions.location_base: Kowloon, Hong Kong / 香港九龙尖沙咀
attractions.location_local: Kowloon, Hong Kong / 香港九龙尖沙咀
attractions.notes_local: 海滨免费。幻彩咏香江每晚8点免费。海滨长廊适合拍港岛景色。博物馆另收费。购物从奢侈品到平价都有。
attractions.notes_base: Free waterfront access. Symphony of Lights show free (8pm nightly). Waterfront promenade perfect for photos of Hong Kong Island. Museums (Space Museum, Art Museum) have separate fees. Excellent shopping from luxury to budget. Nathan Road shopping street. Very touristy but worth visiting.

attractions.name: 庙街夜市 / Temple Street Night Market
attractions.location: Yau Ma Tei, Kowloon, Hong Kong / 香港油麻地庙街
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Evening 19:00-21:00 for full atmosphere
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Hong Kong's most famous night market. Vibrant street market selling clothes, accessories, electronics, souvenirs, and antiques. Street food stalls and dai pai dong (open-air food stalls). Fortune tellers and Cantonese opera singers. Authentic local Hong Kong atmosphere featured in many films.
attractions.location_base: Yau Ma Tei, Kowloon, Hong Kong / 香港油麻地庙街
attractions.location_local: Yau Ma Tei, Kowloon, Hong Kong / 香港油麻地庙街
attractions.notes_local: 免费逛。购物可砍价。试试街头美食（海鲜、煲仔饭）。人多注意随身物品。靠近佐敦/油麻地地铁站。
attractions.notes_base: Free to browse. Bargaining expected for goods. Try street food (seafood, claypot rice). Can be crowded and touristy. Watch belongings. Combine with nearby Jordan/Yau Ma Tei area exploration. MTR: Jordan or Yau Ma Tei station. More local feel than some HK markets.

attractions.name: 大屿山 / Lantau Island
attractions.location: New Territories, Hong Kong / 香港大屿山
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Full day trip. Morning to visit Tian Tan Buddha and Po Lin Monastery.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Hong Kong's largest island featuring Tian Tan Buddha, Po Lin Monastery, Ngong Ping 360 cable car, Tai O fishing village, hiking trails, and beaches. Mix of nature, culture, and adventure. More relaxed pace than Hong Kong Island.
attractions.location_base: New Territories, Hong Kong / 香港大屿山
attractions.location_local: New Territories, Hong Kong / 香港大屿山
attractions.notes_local: 地铁东涌线或渡轮可达。缆车到昂坪（见下条）。可玩一整天。大澳渔村值得去（传统棚屋）。比港岛清幽。
attractions.notes_base: Access via MTR Tung Chung line or ferry. Cable car to Ngong Ping area (see below). Can spend full day exploring. Tai O village worth visiting (traditional stilt houses). Wisdom Path hiking trail. Less developed than main Hong Kong.

attractions.name: 天坛大佛 / Tian Tan Buddha
attractions.location: Ngong Ping, Lantau Island, Hong Kong / 香港大屿山昂坪
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Morning after cable car opens for fewer crowds, clear weather days
attractions.why_worth_visiting: World's largest outdoor seated bronze Buddha statue at 34m tall. Completed 1993, sits on lotus throne atop 268 steps. Offers panoramic views of Lantau Island. Located next to Po Lin Monastery. Major Hong Kong landmark and pilgrimage site.
attractions.location_base: Ngong Ping, Lantau Island, Hong Kong / 香港大屿山昂坪
attractions.location_local: Ngong Ping, Lantau Island, Hong Kong / 香港大屿山昂坪
attractions.notes_local: 外观免费。进入内部60港币（含餐券）。268级台阶。宝莲禅寺有素斋。乘昂坪360缆车或巴士可达。天气好很重要。
attractions.notes_base: Viewing Buddha from base is FREE. Interior access 60 HKD (includes meal coupon). 268 steps to reach base. Vegetarian restaurant at Po Lin Monastery. Access via Ngong Ping 360 cable car or bus. Clear weather important for views and cable car ride. Popular with tour groups.

attractions.name: 昂坪360缆车 / Ngong Ping 360
attractions.location: Tung Chung to Ngong Ping, Lantau Island / 香港大屿山东涌至昂坪
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Clear weather days essential. Weekday mornings for shortest queues.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: 5.7km cable car journey with spectacular aerial views of Lantau Island, South China Sea, Hong Kong Airport, and mountains. 25-minute ride from Tung Chung to Ngong Ping. Crystal cabin option has glass floor. Scenic transport to Tian Tan Buddha.
attractions.location_base: Tung Chung to Ngong Ping, Lantau Island / 香港大屿山东涌至昂坪
attractions.location_local: Tung Chung to Ngong Ping, Lantau Island / 香港大屿山东涌至昂坪
attractions.notes_local: 标准车厢往返约235港币。水晶车厢（玻璃地板）加价。高峰排队1-2小时。网上购票可免排队。大风大雨停运。替代：东涌23路巴士。
attractions.notes_base: Round-trip standard cabin ~HK$235. Crystal cabin (glass floor) extra cost. Can have long queues (1-2 hours peak times). Book online for discounts and skip-queue. Weather-dependent - closed in strong wind/rain. Alternative: bus 23 from Tung Chung (cheaper but no views).

attractions.name: 大三巴牌坊 / Ruins of St. Paul's
attractions.location: Historic Centre of Macau / 澳门大三巴街
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Early morning (7:00-9:00) for fewer crowds, or evening for illumination
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Macau's most famous landmark. Facade of 17th century Church of St. Paul's (destroyed by fire 1835). UNESCO World Heritage Site. Blend of European and Oriental architectural styles. Symbol of Macau's Portuguese heritage. Adjacent to Museum of Macau and Mount Fortress.
attractions.location_base: Historic Centre of Macau / 澳门大三巴街
attractions.location_local: Historic Centre of Macau / 澳门大三巴街
attractions.notes_local: 免费参观。白天和周末人非常多。有台阶通向牌坊。附近有澳门博物馆（15澳门元）。接近街上有很多旅游商店。可登大炮台看城景。
attractions.notes_base: FREE access. Very crowded during day and weekends. Stairs lead up to facade. Museum of Macau nearby (15 MOP). Many tourist shops on approach street. Can climb Mount Fortress for city views. Photography hotspot. Part of Historic Centre of Macau UNESCO area.

attractions.name: 澳门威尼斯人 / The Venetian Macao
attractions.location: Cotai, Macau / 澳门路氹填海区望德圣母湾大马路
attractions.best_time_to_visit: Afternoon or evening. Gondola rides throughout the day.
attractions.why_worth_visiting: Largest casino building in the world and largest single-structure hotel in Asia. Replica of Venice with canals, gondolas, and St. Mark's Square. Free entertainment including gondola serenades. Luxury shopping mall. Impressive architecture and scale. Iconic Macau resort.
attractions.location_base: Cotai, Macau / 澳门路氹填海区望德圣母湾大马路
attractions.location_local: Cotai, Macau / 澳门路氹填海区望德圣母湾大马路
attractions.notes_local: 免费进入参观。贡多拉船另付（128澳门元）。赌场需21岁以上。大运河购物中心350+商店。多家餐厅。渡轮码头有免费接驳巴士。公共区域可拍照。
attractions.notes_base: FREE to enter and explore. Gondola rides cost extra (128 MOP). Casino requires age 21+. Grand Canal Shoppes mall with 350+ stores. Multiple restaurants. Can spend 1-2 hours just walking around. Free shuttle buses from ferry terminals. Photography allowed in public areas (not casino floor).
